long_description: The Moji Universal Ice and Heat wrap is your solution for icing and heating, and it can be worn on a dozen different body parts. Universal ice and heat cell can be microwaved for warmth and put in the freezer for icing. Stretchy compression wrap keeps the hot/cold cell in place; use it on your shoulder, hip, groin, quad, knee, calf, shin, ankle, Achilles, foot, hamstring and piriformis muscle. Whole system weighs just over a pound so you'll barely notice it is on.
short_description: The Moji Universal Ice and Heat wrap is your solution for icing and heating, and it can be worn on a dozen different body parts.
